subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Decisions and Verdicts
lead_paragraph: Matthieu Reeb oversees a panel that serves as the court of last resort for all kinds of disagreements that arise when more than 10,000 athletes compete for gold medals.
snippet: Matthieu Reeb oversees a panel that serves as the court of last resort for all kinds of disagreements that arise when more than 10,000 athletes compete for gold medals.
